items.title: Republicans are eager for President Trump to expand his use of the military on US soil
items.description: President Donald Trump is swiftly implementing his vision of the military as an all-powerful tool for his policy goals

items.title: Chicago churches urge calm resistance to expected federal intervention
items.description: Churches citywide are turning up their response from the pulpit.

items.title: Hundreds mourn 8-year-old, who was killed in a mass shooting at a Minneapolis church
items.description: A funeral has been held for one of two schoolchildren killed when a mass shooter opened fire at a Minneapolis Catholic church during Mass

items.title: Jury selection begins in the trial of the man accused of trying to assassinate Trump
items.description: Jury selection is set to begin in the trial of a man charged with trying to assassinate Donald Trump while he played golf last year in South Florida
